description: EXTERNAL CHANGES TO THE REAR ELEVATION AND INTERNAL RECONFIGURATION IN RELATION TO THE CONVERSION OF PROPERTY INTO 4X SELF-CONTAINED FLATS (PERMITTED UNDER PRIOR APPROVAL APPLICATION REF: 18/P0409).
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 5406/LBP, 5406/1.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until relevant details or samples of the door to be installed at the rear of the development hereby permitted, have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. No works which are the subject of this condition shall be carried out until the details are approved, and the development shall be carried out in full accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no window, door or other opening other than those expressly authorised by this permission shall be constructedon any elevation without planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - In accordance with paragraphs 186 and 187 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.

Condition : 6 - Should the development require further changes to the external elevations, including the maintenance or refurbishment of the external features - i.e render, roof tiles, windows, the applicant is advised to seek planning permission.
